description: An adaptation of the game with the same name has been announced. The original story follows Sayuri Haruno, a girl who attends an elite confectionery school Fleurir on a scholarship to follow her dream to open a pastry shop. There she meets several charming young men.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

__[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/midorikawa-hikaru.html) | [Blog](http://hikaru23.hatenablog.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/greenriver_sr) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%B7%91%E5%B7%9D%E5%85%89)__

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Mirror Knight - Ultraman Zero (Ultraman)
- Wisure - Kishiryu Sentai Ryusolger (Super Sentai)

[Profile](http://zynchro.jp/talent/kakihara.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/charisma.tetsuya.days/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/tetsuya-kakihara/)

Commonly referred to as Kakkii by fans, Kakihara is a voice actor and a singer. As the latter, he is a member of Kiramune (music label) and represents the color of green. He was inspired to become a voice actor by [Yuuji Ueda](https://anilist.co/staff/95058/Yuuji-Ueda)'s performance in the Tokimeki Memorial dating sim game, and moved from Germany to Japan at age 18 to pursue his dream.

Kakihara speaks Japanese, English and German.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Wanderer - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Lloyd Bannings - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
-Asaba Harumasa - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ryouhey_Drunk) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP-evNobN1MJ61xHb8tAhcg)

Won Best Supporting Actor at the 6th Annual Seiyuu Awards for his performance as Kodaka Hasegawa in _Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai_. Also part of the trio Trignal with fellow seiyuu [Takuya Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/102695/Eguchi-Takuya) and [Tsubasa Yonaga](https://anilist.co/staff/95556), and a host of the Kiramune label's radio programs.

Non-Anime Roles:


~!
• Childe (Genshin Impact)
• Hyde Kido (Under Night In-Birth)
• Touri Wataru (Hanaemu Kare to & bloom)!~

__Height:__ 174 cm
